Scene.Rect:
touched = false sX, sY = 0, 0 lastX, lastY = 0, 0 velX, velY = 0, 0
function update(elapsed) if not touched then this.x, this.y = this.x + velX, this.y + velY
if this.x > 640 - this.width then velX = -1 * velX end if this.x < 0 then velX = -1 * velX end if this.y > 480 - this.height then velY = -1 * velY end if this.y < 0 then velY = -1 * velY end end end
function mouseDown(x, y) print("touchBegan") text.text = "Touch Down" touched = true this.color = Color(1, 0, 1, 1)
sX = x - this.x sY = y - this.y end
function mouseDrag(x, y) print("touchMoved") text.text = "Touch Moved"
this.x, this.y = x - sX, y - sY velX, velY = this.x - lastX, this.y - lastY lastX, lastY = this.x, this.y end
function mouseUp(x, y) print("touchEnded") text.text = "Touch Ended" touched = false this.color = Color(0, 0, 1, 1)
sX, sY = 0, 0 end
